export default function AboutPage() { return ( {/* Hero Section */}

About COWHERD

Bridging the gap between agriculture and education through comprehensive cattle knowledge and sustainable farming practices.

{/* Mission Statement */}

Our Mission

To educate and inspire people about the vital role of cattle in agriculture, culture, and sustainable food systems while promoting ethical animal husbandry and environmental stewardship.

Education

Providing comprehensive, accurate, and engaging educational resources for all ages and backgrounds.

Sustainability

Promoting sustainable and regenerative farming practices that benefit both animals and the environment.

Animal Welfare

Advocating for the highest standards of animal care, welfare, and ethical treatment.

Community

Building bridges between farmers, educators, students, and the general public.

{/* Statistics */}

Our Impact

Making a difference in agricultural education worldwide

{stats.map((stat, index) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
 ); })}
{/* Timeline */}

Our Journey

{/* Timeline dot */}

{milestone.title}

{milestone.description}

))}
{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

Dedicated experts passionate about agricultural education and animal welfare

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (
👤

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

{/* Expertise Tags */}
{member.expertise.slice(0, 2).map((skill) => ( {skill} ))} {member.expertise.length > 2 && ( +{member.expertise.length - 2} )}
{/* Social Links */}
))}
{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Accuracy

We ensure all our educational content is scientifically accurate, up-to-date, and thoroughly researched.

Innovation

We continuously innovate our teaching methods and technologies to make learning more engaging and effective.

Compassion

We promote compassionate treatment of animals and respect for the farmers who care for them.

{/* Call to Action */}

Join Our Mission

Whether you're an educator, farmer, student, or simply curious about agriculture, we invite you to be part of our educational community.

); }

export default function ContactPage() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', organization: '', subject: '', category: '', message: '', urgent: false, subscribe: false }); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [submitStatus, setSubmitStatus] = useState<'idle' | 'success' | 'error'>('idle'); const handleInputChange = (field: keyof ContactFormData, value: string | boolean) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); // Simulate form submission try { await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setSubmitStatus('success'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', organization: '', subject: '', category: '', message: '', urgent: false, subscribe: false }); } catch (error) { setSubmitStatus('error'); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; return ( {/* Hero Section */}

Get In Touch

Have questions about our resources? Want to collaborate? We'd love to hear from you and help advance agricultural education together.

{/* Contact Methods */}
{contactMethods.map((method, index) => { const Icon = method.icon; return ( window.open(method.action, '_blank')}>

{method.title}

{method.value}

{method.description}

 ); })}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Contact Form */}
Send Us a Message

Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

{submitStatus === 'success' && (

Message sent successfully!

We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

)} {submitStatus === 'error' && (

Failed to send message

Please try again or contact us directly.

)}
handleInputChange('name', e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your full name" />
handleInputChange('email', e.target.value)} placeholder="your.email@example.com" />
handleInputChange('organization', e.target.value)} placeholder="School, University, Farm, Organization (optional)" />
handleInputChange('subject', e.target.value)} placeholder="Brief subject of your inquiry" />

export default function CulturePage() { return ( {/* Hero Section */}

Cultural Significance of Cattle

Explore how cattle have shaped human civilization, spirituality, and culture across different societies throughout history and into the present day.

Global Traditions
Ancient to Modern
Sacred Bonds
{/* Introduction */}

A Universal Connection

For over 10,000 years, cattle have been more than just livestock to human societies. They have been symbols of wealth, objects of worship, sources of sustenance, and integral parts of cultural identity across virtually every civilization on Earth.

{/* Cultural Traditions */}

Traditions Around the World

Discover how different cultures have honored and integrated cattle into their way of life

{culturalTraditions.map((tradition, index) => (
{tradition.icon}
{tradition.culture}

{tradition.region}

{tradition.significance}

{tradition.description}

Cultural Practices

    {tradition.practices.map((practice, idx) => (
  • {practice}
    • ))}

Symbolic Meaning

    {tradition.symbolism.map((symbol, idx) => (
  • {symbol}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Modern Significance */}

Modern Cultural Impact

How cattle continue to influence contemporary culture and society

{modernSignificance.map((item, index) => (
{item.icon}

{item.title}

{item.description}

))}
{/* Cultural Facts */}

Cultural Facts

Fascinating insights into the cultural importance of cattle

{culturalFacts.map((fact, index) => (

{fact}

))}
{/* Timeline of Cultural Evolution */}

Cultural Evolution Timeline

The changing role of cattle in human culture through the ages

{[ { period: '8000 BCE', title: 'Domestication Begins', description: 'First domestication of aurochs in the Fertile Crescent marks the beginning of cattle\'s cultural journey with humans.' }, { period: '3000 BCE', title: 'Religious Significance', description: 'Cattle become central to religious practices in Egypt, India, and Mesopotamia, symbolizing fertility and divine power.' }, { period: '500 CE', title: 'Medieval Agriculture', description: 'Cattle become essential to feudal systems, representing wealth and enabling agricultural expansion across Europe.' }, { period: '1500 CE', title: 'Global Spread', description: 'European colonization spreads cattle breeds worldwide, introducing new cultural practices and agricultural systems.' }, { period: '1800s', title: 'Industrial Revolution', description: 'Mechanization changes cattle farming, but cultural significance persists in rural communities and traditions.' }, { period: 'Present', title: 'Cultural Renaissance', description: 'Renewed appreciation for traditional cattle cultures and sustainable practices in modern agricultural movements.' } ].map((era, index) => (
{era.period}

{era.title}

{era.description}
))}
{/* Call to Action */}

Explore More Cultural Connections

Dive deeper into the fascinating relationship between cattle and human culture through our comprehensive educational resources.

Educational Facts

Learn more cultural facts

Breed Heritage

Discover breed origins

Modern Impact

Contemporary significance
); }
